name: Genbu 1
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Starting on turn 2, Genbu alternates between two skills, <color=#F1ED40>High Tide</color> and <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>.
1. <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>: Inflict the <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> status on 2 Phantom Thieves. Clear all Shadows from the battle and summon 2 Decarabias and 2 Yurlungurs.
2. <color=#F1ED40>High Tide</color>: Deal damage to all Phantom Thieves, and inflict the <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> status on 1 Phantom Thief.
3. <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color>: Deal damage equal to 10% of max HP at the end of each turn. This effect lasts 4 turns and can stack.
4. When Decarabia is defeated, 1 stack of <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> will be removed. During <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>, each Decarabia inflicts 1 stack of <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> on all Phantom Thieves.
5. When Yurlungur is defeated, all Phantom Thieves recover 20% of their max HP, and all Shadows' Defense decreases for 2 turns. During <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>, each Yurlungur heals all Shadows for 20% of their max HP.

name: Genbu 2
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Starting on turn 2, Genbu alternates between two skills, <color=#F1ED40>High Tide</color> and <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>.
1. <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>: Inflict the <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> status on 2 Phantom Thieves. Clear all Shadows from the battle and summon 2 Decarabias and 2 Yurlungurs.
2. <color=#F1ED40>High Tide</color>: Deal damage to all Phantom Thieves, and inflict the <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> status on 1 Phantom Thief.
3. <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color>: Deal damage equal to 10% of max HP at the end of each turn. This effect lasts 4 turns and can stack.
4. When Decarabia is defeated, 1 stack of <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> will be removed. During <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>, each Decarabia inflicts 1 stack of <color=#F1ED40>Submerged</color> on all Phantom Thieves.
5. When Yurlungur is defeated, all Phantom Thieves recover 20% of their max HP, and all Shadows' Defense decreases for 2 turns. During <color=#F1ED40>Ebb Tide</color>, each Yurlungur heals all Shadows for 20% of their max HP.

description:

name: Raja Naga 1
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Raja Naga alternates between the following skills:
1. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Decree</color>: Grant 3 <color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color> stacks to all Shadows.
<color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color>: Decrease damage taken by 15%. This effect stacks up to 5 times. Lose 1 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Punishment</color>: Lock on to a Phantom Thief, and deal severe damage on the next turn. If Nagas take damage a total of 15 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

name: Raja Naga 2
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Raja Naga alternates between the following skills:
1. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Decree</color>: Grant 3 <color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color> stacks to all Shadows.
<color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color>: Decrease damage taken by 15%. This effect stacks up to 5 times. Lose 1 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Punishment</color>: Lock on to a Phantom Thief, and deal severe damage on the next turn. If Nagas take damage a total of 15 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

name: Raja Naga 3
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Raja Naga alternates between the following skills:
1. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Decree</color>: Grant 3 <color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color> stacks to all Shadows.
<color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color>: Decrease damage taken by 15%. This effect stacks up to 5 times. Lose 1 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Punishment</color>: Lock on to a Phantom Thief, and deal severe damage on the next turn. If Nagas take damage a total of 15 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

name: Raja Naga 4
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Raja Naga uses the following skills:
1. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Decree</color>: Grant 3 stacks of <color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color> to all Shadows.
<color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color>: Decrease damage taken by 15%, up to 5 stacks. Lose 1 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Punishment</color>: Lock on to a Phantom Thief, and deal severe damage on the next turn. If Raja Naga takes damage a total of 20 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Blessing</color>: When any other Naga has 25% or more of its max HP remaining, greatly increase its own damage. Afterwards, all other Nagas heal 50% of their HP.
4. At the start of each turn, Raja Naga automatically gains 1 <color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color> stack.
5. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

name: Raja Naga 5
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Raja Naga uses the following skills:
1. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Decree</color>: Grant 3 stacks of <color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color> to all Shadows.
<color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color>: Decrease damage taken by 15%, up to 5 stacks. Lose 2 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Punishment</color>: Lock on to a Phantom Thief, and deal severe damage on the next turn. If Raja Naga takes damage a total of 25 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. <color=#FF3B37>Royal Blessing</color>: When any other Naga has 25% or more of its max HP remaining, greatly increase its own damage. Afterwards, all other Nagas heal 50% of their HP.
4. At the start of each turn, Raja Naga automatically gains 1 <color=#FF3B37>Royal Shield</color> stack.
5. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

name: Unicorn 1
description:
Shadows' weaknesses and resistances are different than normal.
Unicorn will activate <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Blessing</color> and then activate <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Radiance</color> 2 turns later.
1. <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Blessing</color>: Deal Bless damage to all Phantom Thieves, gain 10 <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stacks, and summon 1 Nigi Mitama.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Radiance</color>: Deal heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves based on the number of <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stacks. If there are 5 or more <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stacks, the Phantom Thieves will also be inflicted with the <color=#FF3B37>Rebuke</color> status.
<color=#FF3B37>Rebuke</color>: Permanently increase damage taken by 50%.
3. <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color>: Decrease Unicorn's damage taken by 5% for each stack. Lose 1 stack for each status ailment inflicted.
4. When Nigi Mitama is inflicted with a status ailment, the same ailment is inflicted on Unicorn, and 1 <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stack is removed.
5. Nigi Mitama will be defeated after 1 action. When defeated, Nigi Mitama will deal damage to Unicorn equal to its HP lost.

name: Unicorn 2
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Unicorn will activate <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Blessing</color> and then activate <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Radiance</color> 2 turns later.
1. <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Blessing</color>: Deal Bless damage to all Phantom Thieves, gain 10 <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stacks, and summon 1 Nigi Mitama.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Sacred Radiance</color>: Deal heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves based on the number of <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stacks. If there are 5 or more <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stacks, the Phantom Thieves will also be inflicted with the <color=#FF3B37>Rebuke</color> status.
<color=#FF3B37>Rebuke</color>: Permanently increase damage taken by 50%.
3. <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color>: Decrease Unicorn's damage taken by 5% for each stack. Lose 1 stack for each status ailment inflicted.
4. When Nigi Mitama is inflicted with a status ailment, the same ailment is inflicted on Unicorn, and 1 <color=#FF3B37>Purity</color> stack is removed.
5. Nigi Mitama will die after 1 action, and Unicorn will take damage equal to the HP lost by Nigi Mitama.

name: Hell Biker 1
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
Hell Biker alternates between using <color=#FF3B37>Hellfire</color> and <color=#FF3B37>Cleansing Flame</color>.
1. <color=#FF3B37>Hellfire</color>: Deal heavy Fire damage to all Phantom Thieves, and inflict <color=#FF3B37>Hellscorched</color> if the target's HP is decreased by this attack. <color=#FF3B37>Hellscorched</color>: Take damage equal to 35% of max HP each turn.
2. <color=#FF3B37>Cleansing Flame</color>: Deal heavy Fire damage to the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, permanently decrease the target's Attack by 50%, and increase Hell Biker's Attack by 30%.
3. Oni and Hell Biker are in the Soul Link state.
4. Oni will prioritize attacking the Phantom Thief with the lowest HP.

name: Shiki-Ouji 1
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Shiki-Ouji changes between Attack Form and Defense Form every turn.
2. In Defense Form, Shiki-Ouji gains 5 <color=#FF423F>Defensive Stance</color> stacks.
<color=#FF423F>Defensive Stance</color>: Damage taken is decreased by 10%. Lose 1 stack when taking weakness damage.
3. In Attack Form, Shiki-Ouji will act twice, and for each <color=#FF423F>Defensive Stance</color>, it will gain 1 <color=#FF423F>Offensive Stance</color> stack.
<color=#FF423F>Offensive Stance</color>: Increase Shiki-Ouji's damage dealt by 25%.
4. In Defense Form, Shiki-Ouji gains <color=#FF423F>Defense Position</color>.
Defense Position: All non-Weak attributes change to Resist for 1 turn.

name: Shiki-Ouji 2
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Shiki-Ouji changes between Attack Form and Defense Form every turn.
2. In Defense Form, Shiki-Ouji gains 5 <color=#FF423F>Defensive Stance</color> stacks.
<color=#FF423F>Defensive Stance</color>: Damage taken is decreased by 10%. Lose 1 stack when taking weakness damage.
3. In Attack Form, Shiki-Ouji will act twice, and for each <color=#FF423F>Defensive Stance</color>, it will gain 1 <color=#FF423F>Offensive Stance</color> stack.

name: Belphegor 1
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Belphegor is always Asleep. After being attacked, it will wake up, deal heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves and heal 15% of its max HP.
2. At the start of Belphegor's turn, if it is not Asleep, it will summon 2 Sandmen.
3. When Sandman is summoned, or at the start of its turn, it gains 1 <color=#FF3B37>Eternal Slumber</color> stack.
4. At the start of each Phantom Thief's turn, if Belphegor is awake, Sandman will spend <color=#FF3B37>Eternal Slumber</color> to put it to Sleep. This effect activates once every turn.

name: Kumbhanda 1
description:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Kumbhanda's attacks permanently inflict 1 <color=#FF3B37>Starvation</color> stack on Phantom Thieves.
Starvation: Decrease max HP by 15%, and grant 1 <color=#FF3B37>Full Stomach</color> stack to Agathion.
2. Every other turn, 1 Agathion is summoned.
3. When Kumbhanda is defeated, all Starvation and Full Stomach stacks are removed.
4. After the Phantom Thieves have spent a total of 150 SP, remove 1 Full Stomach stack from Agathion and 1 Starvation stack from all Phantom Thieves.
5. When Agathion has Full Stomach, all affinities change to Null. When it has 3 Full Stomach stacks at the end of the turn, it changes to Kumbhanda.

name: Arahabaki 1
description:
1. When Arahabaki is on the field, it will summon 1 additional Arahabaki.
2. At the start of Arahabaki's turn, Arahabaki's <color=#FF3B37>Progress</color> increases for each summoned Arahabaki on the field.
When Progress reaches 10, Arahabaki activates <color=#FF3B37>Abyssal Gaze</color>. This skill's damage increases according to the number of summoned Arahabaki on the field.
3. While Arahabaki is on the field, all Shadows gain <color=#FF3B37>Muddy Armor</color> and <color=#FF3B37>Melted Armor</color> every 2 turns.
Muddy Armor: Decrease final damage taken by 20%. When inflicted with Burn, this effect is removed.
Melted Armor: Decrease final damage taken by 40%. When Burn is removed, Muddy Armor and Melted Armor are removed from all Shadows.
